statements: DELETE FROM education_partnerships WHERE partnership_name = 'ABC University';
DELETE FROM education_partnerships WHERE partnership_id = 101 AND partner_country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM education_partnerships WHERE partnership_type = 'Research' AND partner_country = 'Canada';
DELETE FROM collaborations WHERE university_name = 'University of ABC'
DELETE FROM partnerships WHERE country = 'USA' AND collaboration_type = 'Research'
DELETE FROM universities WHERE country = 'USA' AND established_date < '2000-01-01';
